documents.document: A monthly subscription of bookish/fandom related trinkets & collectibles plus the latest novel to hit the shelves. Yup, sign me up again 🙌🙌
RoseBlood by A.G. Howard: A dark romantic retelling of The Phantom of the Opera. Book mark, badge, calendar, magnet… https://t.co/wGnDsRKnWR
Anyone else OBSESSED with this part of the new #BeautyAndTheBeast trailer oooorrr just me? 😍😍😍 https://t.co/OsWC8vLQQo
YES my very first @owlcrate arrived 🙌🙌 https://t.co/4DNoaZX1ST
"Tsundoku is the act of acquiring books & not reading them." I vow not to do this, if I buy a book this year I will read it this year also 📚
I'm a tiny little Hedgehog 🐗 https://t.co/VqaJh2uQQA
I may actually die crying at this film 💔💜🌹 #BeOurGuest #BeautyAndTheBeast https://t.co/3h4xPC3aBC
Think I might have to have a bit of an Oscars nominated movie marathon at home by myself this weekend 🙌🙌
Why are there no good times for Manchester by the Sea 😔😔 Either too early I won't make it in time or too late I won't be able to get home!
I just realised that Snowden never got an NZ cinema release.. At least not in Wellington. Its out on bluray & I'm still waiting to see it 😞😞
My new flat mate hung this in our kitchen. He is infact a soon to be 30 year old male, not a 45 year old mum as the… https://t.co/4JYYSoV4Ln
Made a good dent. Quarter of the way through Spark in my first hour sitting. So far really great & would already recommend 👌📚❤️ @RachaelCraw
Just discovered I don't infact own a bookmark.. WHAT?! So I made one out of this old cut out of pop Thor 😝😝 https://t.co/DGQW90sXLX
Currently reading Spark. Bought the whole trilogy cause it was insane cheap & just sitting on the counter as if wai… https://t.co/p9bLJo8USG
"This monster is something different. Something ancient. Something wild." This beautiful edition of #AMonsterCalls… https://t.co/be89ovXKa3
Went for a trip to @ArtyBees after work today & I did incredibly well for myself 📚❤️
These new shoes are super cute. But man are they painful to break in. Half a day & my feet are cut up so bad 😭😭 https://t.co/3ROH9npXqD
Going to meet my Dad for lunch. I can do that now I work in town ✌
AND I learnt this all myself as a 'attempted delivery' slip wasn't left. Get your shit together NZ post. Seriously.
It also states that signature is not required, so why not leave the package at the delivery address in the first place?!
NZ post have royally fucked me off. So my Owl Crate was delivered, but taken to a depot because no one was home. Do I know which depot? HA!
Listening to @Deanogormano on the radio this morning ✌📻
This is actually perfect 👌😍😍😍 https://t.co/6wbGgRQwP8
Shouldn't be this funny but I am dying 😂😂😂 https://t.co/3P7ur79a2O
I can't stand it when people I love cry in films. But the second it turns into a smile cry I just 😍😍😍😍😍
Didn't get to say hi to Dean tonight 😔😔 So just reminiscing about this awesome time with Aidan & Dean 👌❤️… https://t.co/0004zxWGSB
What a fan-fucking-tastic movie! I laughed. I cried. I cheered. I loved. Dean O'Gorman, what a delight ✊💛 @Deanogormano @PorkPieMovie
Hey, remember that time when.. We would always walk to Wonderland & did lots of photoshoots. #amyleigh 📸
I am actually just so terrified they are never going to make more Sherlock again. Completely scared to my core 😢💔
Don't ever try to tell me that young Sherlock hugging fat Mycroft isn't everything because you would be wrong. https://t.co/37e17MmYSP
Finally watching The Final Problem again 💔💜
@jennafuss @amyvalhalla @Deanogormano lol I fail, I literally just saw that after I tweeted XD
Hanging out with the one & only @jennafuss tonight. Going to an advanced screening of Pork Pie 🙌🙌 Fingers crossed @Deanogormano is there 😄😄
@jennafuss I know right!! You'd be silly to not play that when I'm card sar 😅😅
Playing Cards Against Humanity. Needless to say this card won on my turn 😂😂 https://t.co/679dmdPL54
Now gotta wait 2 weeks for more Blindspot?! I am not okay with this.. *sulks* 😔😔
"The wand chooses the Wizard Mr. Potter." 💔 #RipJohnHurt https://t.co/9zc3Jxf4MD
Catching up on Blindspot. I have missed TV 😍😍
My mightyape order arrived while I was away 🙌 Always fun to come home to mail. But no Owl Crate yet 😔
Going to a friend's BBQ 'party' tonight. So that should be fun. I need some different people around me fiiiinally!
Annnnnnd I'm home 🙌 I hate road trips when your holiday is over.. https://t.co/k7eQewFXZF
Breakfast sundae & coffee 👌😋☕ https://t.co/KM92tciijk
One more day of holiday before the road trip home 😔 don't wanna leave. Starting our last day at the local cafe for breakfast & coffee 😊
BUT!!!! No nomination for Aaron Taylor-Johnson or Jake Gyllanhaal for Nocturnal Animals?! I actually feel attacked right now.. 😞😞
I'm mostly happy with the Oscar Noms & it was at least what I was expecting. & could probs give you pretty solid predictions right now.
On Monday we went to the Polynesian Spa pools & it was bloody fantastic 👌😍 @PolynesianSpa
No sunbathing for me today, or maybe even the rest of the week.. Today is overcast so inside & reading or coloring for me 😊😊
First day of sun on holiday & we all got sunburnt. I got extremely sunburnt & now I hurt everywhere.. 🌞⛱️ https://t.co/1iQ0FZIsfb
It's finally really hot, & sunny, & no wind 🙌🌞⛱️ https://t.co/BzBURMffoV
This little cutie visited our batch this morning. My heart 🐶❤️ https://t.co/29JTPXKzQX
Tomorrow it will be sun, sand, & swim 🌞⛱🌊
The weather is supposed to pick up for the rest of our time here though, so one write off day was okay & actually really nice 😊😊
Today was miserable & wet alllll day. So we stayed inside playing board games, eating, & drinking. Alot! 😂😂
Got nooo signal where we are staying at the beach so no Internet for me unless I wonder round until I get bars.. 🙄🙄
Off to the lake for a week beach holiday ⛱ But first, the 7 hour drive up there. First stop, River Cottage Cafe in… https://t.co/EaL1GzhmKM
30 years old?! I can't believe it. He doesn't look a day over 21!! Happy Birthday to my Bae 😙😙 #EvanPeters https://t.co/d9Ah5GoaaA
Woo hoo. I just got my first work bonus for this year! 😄😄 *puts straight into savings account* https://t.co/YP6cMWL3b0
Spent my entire Friday off work cleaning the house like some chump 😒😒 Plus side is the house looks immaculate 👌
"Auckland was the last. Save the best for last" ✊✊ I can't even express how happy I am to have Ed back again ❤️❤️ https://t.co/XjjNi2WzbM
Got myself a new t-shirt. My loves 😄😄 #marvel https://t.co/6HOMhB6ew7
If people think I'm nerdy, this is my Dad & his mate playing Warhammer. Now you know where I get it from 😂😂 https://t.co/7RDthAZryy
@jennafuss @amyvalhalla WHAT IS HAPPENING?! Instagram did get me to verify my account.. Maybe I got hacked?! Lol.
@elliot_coen Maybe that person is a robot.
@jennafuss WHO THE FUCK IS CORY?!
LOL @jennafuss that's quite freaky.. https://t.co/YkpFMzkBoY
@amyvalhalla @joshuahorowitz If it beats the pub quiz I'll be very surprised. Best. Video. Ever.
Thank you Mike for once again a perfectly beautiful, magical, emotional & fan-fucking-tastic night. You leave me in… https://t.co/ZezWjXNpmS
Can you tell we had ALOT of fun at the @passengermusic gig 😄😄 @jennafuss https://t.co/vbP2BthvRU
@adeline_sky Just saw them live 👌❤️
I am on a could ⛅😄 @thepaperkites have made me very happy ❤️❤️
@amyvalhalla It was still on the coat rack. I didn't realise it was raining SO hard until I opening the door. It's a very good jacket 😚😚
Had to change my outfit at the very last minute because it started POURING down with rain.. 😒😒
@jennafuss @amyvalhalla I just watched like 15 of these 😅😅
OMG @jennafuss THANK YOU FOR THIS 😂😂😂 https://t.co/5VDGaySZqh
Wiskey Tango Foxtrot was much better than I had thought 👍
How did I NOT know that Martin Freeman is Scottish in this film before watching it?! His accent is actually so good 😝😝
@Jamie5Star Edinburgh, London for a while but not to live. I'll go back to Scotland to live.
@Jamie5Star Not sure yet. At least 2 years. See what happens ☺️
@Jamie5Star I still won't be able to go. I'm saving to move to the UK & it costs too much to get to Oz 😔😔 I'll just wait for the UK con's 😊😊
@Jamie5Star I hope they are still doing it when I'm in the UK in 2018!!!
@Jamie5Star I'd go regardless so I'm the wrong person to ask opinion on that one, haha. But ESPECIALLY if Martin was there!
Now watching Wiskey Tango Foxtrot because this silver fox 😘😘 https://t.co/TpW5FCWujt
Okay, so that movie was actually quite lame. But it's okay because Seb made up for it muchly.
Sebastian is so fucking hot in this film. I mean, always. But actual UGH 😍😍 https://t.co/QEo0NKtmic
Fiiinally watching The Bronze ✌ https://t.co/sYgCvBs01O
Besides the obvious choice of Sherlock, Rory Slippery may just be my other favourite character Benedict has done ❤️❤️
I need some comfort TV & some #BenedictCumberbatch & that comes in the best form of Rory Slippery in… https://t.co/jMIRmmnwll
@amyvalhalla I think that was the saddest part, the fact that it felt so incredibly final.. 😔😔
Ginger hair don't care ✌️🎃 https://t.co/UE5BTPyK5Q
Hey, remember that time when.. A duck turned up at our flat & we fed her & named her Penny. #amyleigh 🐥
@passengermusic It's so good to have you back. Can't wait for tomorrow night 🙌🙌❤️❤️
Kayleigh is GINGER! Soon to be blond, but I'll enjoy this while it lasts 😄😄
Went for a walk to the mall, shopped for few hours, walked home, didn't get the one thing I went to the mall for.. They didn't have it 😒😒😒
Dying my hair. Say goodbye to boring brown hair Kayleigh 👋💁 https://t.co/M53zhcO58K
Now I'm just depressed that #Sherlock is all over again for the forseable future.. Or ever.. If you need me I'll be… https://t.co/XVWoRTzng5
Pheeew, need to down several glasses of water, dry my sticky face, & watch that again asap.. #thefinalproblem #sherlock
To all who have not yet seen #TheFinalProblem I have no words of comfort.. 😵😢❤️ #Sherlock https://t.co/gVCaJW2tuv
@EmilyIsabelle @KilljoyKathleen Can we all Skype ASAP to talk about it plllleeeease? 😢😢
Me after The Final Problem.. https://t.co/FaUR8sW2jo
OMG GUYS I ACTUALLY SCREAMED OUT LOUD 😵😵 #SHERLOCK
